directions: Pour passion fruit-flavored rum, mango-flavored rum, peach schnapps, and whipped cream flavored vodka into a large glass; add lime juice and grenadine syrup. Float seltzer water atop the cocktail; garnish with mango and maraschino cherries. Add ice to cocktail as desired.
ingredients: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger passion fruit-flavored rum
1/2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger whipped cream-flavored vodka
1 splash seltzer water, or to taste
2 frozen mango chunks, or to taste
1/4 cup ice cubes, or as desired
title: Hurricane Jessica
